original_text: We know that God spoke to Moses, but as for this fellow, we don’t even know where he comes from.”
korean_text: 하나님이 모세에게는 말씀하신 줄을 우리가 알거니와 이 사람은 어디서 왔는지 알지 못하노라

sentences.original_text: We know that God spoke to Moses,
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 하나님이 모세에게 말씀하신 것을 압니다,

sentences.original_text: we don't even know where he comes from.
